entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Qualicum Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:59 AM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
